publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-253# Mr Gil Paterson: Protection of Victims in Rape Cases—That the Parliament notes the recent report produced by Soroptomist International into the way rape victims are treated by the legal system and recognises the need to address the way the legal system, which currently fails to protect adequately women and children, operates in such cases.

S1M-253# Mr Gil Paterson: Protection of Victims in Rape Cases—That the Parliament notes the recent report produced by Soroptomist International into the way rape victims are treated by the legal system and recognises the need to address the way the legal system, which currently fails to protect adequately women and children, operates in such cases. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Tricia Marwick*

S1M-253# Protection of Victims in Rape Cases (lodged on 4 November 1999) Fiona Hyslop*, Fiona McLeod*, Kay Ullrich*, Andrew Wilson*, Michael Russell*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Michael Matheson*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Shona Robison*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Irene McGugan*, Alasdair Morgan*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Brian Adam*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr John Swinney*, Dr Winnie Ewing*, Alex Neil*, Colin Campbell*, Richard Lochhead*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-253# Protection of Victims in Rape Cases (lodged on 4 November 1999) Robin Harper*

S1M-253# Mr Gil Paterson: Protection of Victims in Rape Cases-That the Parliament notes the recent report produced by Soroptomist International into the way rape victims are treated by the legal system and recognises the need to address the way the legal system, which currently fails to protect adequately women and children, operates in such cases. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Tricia Marwick, Fiona Hyslop, Fiona McLeod, Kay Ullrich, Andrew Wilson, Michael Russell, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Ms Margo MacDonald, Michael Matheson, Christine Grahame, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Adam Ingram, Shona Robison, Linda Fabiani, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Irene McGugan, Alasdair Morgan, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Fergus Ewing, Mr Andrew Welsh, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Brian Adam, Bruce Crawford, Mr John Swinney, Dr Winnie Ewing, Alex Neil, Colin Campbell, Richard Lochhead, Nicola Sturgeon, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Sandra White, Robin Harper, Dennis Canavan*
